description: Section 73 application (Minor Material Amendment) to vary condition 2 (Drawings) of Planning Permission Reference: P2023/0524/S73 dated 26/05/2023 for Section 73 application (Minor Material Amendment) to vary condition 2 (Drawings) of Planning Permission Reference: P2021/2951/FUL dated 20/12/2021 for replacement of existing single glazed timber windows with double glazed timber windows to the front and rear elevations.' amendments seek to increase the approved glazing thickness from 12mm to 24mm.' latest amendments seek to retain the already approved 24mm glazing thickness, with alterations to the associated window type B detail drawings - primarily changing a fixed panel to a top fan light.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from 20th December 2021.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
